name: Deadland
description:
You control a veteran gunman, Vlatko in "Deadland" whose only purpose is to survive in a ghost town. However you are not alone in this land.

Our character explores the area around him but there are supernatural stuff happening in this town. Red colored swirls appear as you walk through the town, and zombies come out from those portals. Vlatko pulls out his old pistol and finds a rifle to kill all spawned enemies around him.

If you want to survive, you must kill as much as zombies to save yourself and to have a chance of escaping this town.

If you are a fan of first person shooter games, this game is right for you.

------------ How to Play-------------

 -Movement

W- Move Forward
S- Move Backward
A- Strafe Left
D- Strafe Right

Space- Jump

Left Shift- Run

Left Mouse Button - Shoot

1- Use Pistol

2- Use Assault Rifle
